title: Strengthening Pedagogical Practical Competencies: Standardized Feedback Process for Robotic Surgery Training

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Surgical Procedures and the Robotic Surgical System (da Vinci Xi) Interface
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Performance of basic robotic surgery system operations with over 80% accuracy.
Reduced surgical errors by over 30% according to standardized real-time feedback criteria

Learners will self-assess their surgical performance using the GEARS evaluation criteria (5 items: preparation, surgical technique, time management, organization, situational awareness), achieve an average of 3.5 or higher on a 5-point scale per item, and establish at least two improvement plans based on the results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
